name: Brisket's Bane
description:
Controls: WASD to move, mouse to rotate camera, and left click to shoot. 

This game is an inside joke taken too far. It is based on the gameplay of Risk of Rain 2. 

A friend of mine wanted to gift another friend a copy of Risk of Rain 2, which was refused, claiming he only accepted hand-made gifts. 

So...this counts as a hand-made gift, right? 👉👈
